alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Owsley, northeastern Jackson, southwestern Lee and north central Clay Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Zion, or 7 miles northeast of McKee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delvinta, Cressmont, Green Hall, Elian and Nathanton around 225 PM EDT. Vincent, Travellers Rest, Sturgeon and Ida May around 230 PM EDT. Scoville, Levi, Endee, Pebworth, Blake and Island City around 235 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Booneville, Turin, Chestnut Gap, Major, Conkling, Eversole, Cowcreek, Southfork and Taff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
